game_info.name: FTL Clone
game_info.description: Real-time-with-pause spaceship roguelike. Manage ship systems, distribute power, direct crew, target enemy systems. Jump through sectors while staying ahead of rebel fleet.

core_loop.description: View sector map -> Jump to beacon -> Encounter event/combat -> Collect rewards -> Repeat until sector exit -> Choose next sector -> Reach Sector 8 and defeat flagship

primary_action.description: Select systems, target weapons, move crew

combat_profile.how_to_attack: Click on enemy room to target, weapons auto-fire when charged. Space to pause and issue orders. Manage power between shields/weapons/engines.
